casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bernard George LAMP, Jr. No. 222A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 16, 2016. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Kathleen M. Joyce, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Sarah M. Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.). Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of February 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of February 2016."
